GisPtr< T > Class Template Reference

#include <GisPtr.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class GisPtr< T >

GisPtr is smart pointer to FDO objects. It automatically handles the memory management for these objects. In particular it handles the adding and releasing of references on the objects, and their deletion when the last reference is released.

When the GisPtr goes out of scope, the FDO object that it references is released.

Definition at line 61 of file GisPtr.h.

void Attach (T *p2) throw ()
 Attaches the given object to this GisPtr. It does not add a reference on the object. However, the object previously referenced by this GisPtr is released.
bool CopyTo (T **ppT) throw ()
 Copies this GisPtr's object to a double pointer. A reference is added to the object.
T * Detach () throw ()
 Detaches this GisPtr's object from this GisPtr. It does not release the object.
